text: Mayen-Koblenz is a district (Kreis) in the north of Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. The two main rivers of the district are the Rhine and the Moselle. In the west of the district are the Eifel mountains. ==Towns and municipalities== Verband-free towns #Andernach #Bendorf #Mayen Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden *1.
